hymn.title: Lord, I am continually with Thee

layout.singingstanza: Lord, I am cont -- in -- ual -- ly with Thee: Thou hast hold -- en me by my right hand, Thou shalt guide me— Thou shalt guide me with Thy coun -- sel, And af -- ter -- ward re -- ceive me— Re -- ceive me to glo -- ry.

lyrics.stanza: Whom have I in heaven but Thee? And there is none upon the earth That I desire beside Thee. My flesh and my heart faileth; But God is the strength of my heart, And my portion forever.
